text: My War is a record album by the Bear Quartet released in 2000 on the record label A West Side Fabrication. At the time of the release it received generally good reviews. The album has more acoustic guitars than its predecessors, accompanied by electronic sounds. ==Track listing== # "What I Hate" # "Old Friends" # "Helpless" # "Everybody Gets to Play" # "Needs Vs. Facts" # "Walking Out" # "Eastbound" # "I Had a Job" # "I Don't Wanna" # "I Can Wait" ==References== ==External links== *Short description and lyrics at fan page Category:2000 albums Category:The Bear Quartet albums
title: My War (The Bear Quartet album)
